mapper.select: SELECT tds.tour_detail_schedule_id as tourDetailScheduleId, tds.tour_id as tourId, schedule_date AS scheduleDate, c.country_name as countryName, c.city_name as cityName, tds.Title as title, tds.Description as description FROM TOUR_DETAIL_SCHEDULE tds left outer join CITY c on tds.city_id = c.city_id ORDER BY tds.tour_detail_schedule_id OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
